name: BeepBox - Music Software
description:
This project is branched from Shaktools BeepBox website online.

MAKE SICK BEATS

Just hop on in and start creating, it's super easy to use and involves almost no skill!

DOWNLOAD YOUR MUSIC

When you're done with your song, export it in the file tab!

SHARE IT WITH THE WORLD

You can publish your beats to the world and impress others!

All Assets and Code belong to Shaktool - I didn't make any of it!
